newsitem.title: USA: New World Coffee franchises in Germany.
newsitem.headline: New World Coffee franchises in Germany.

text.p: New World Coffee, a specialty coffee retailer, said Thursday it has signed its first international franchise agreement in Germany.

A pilot store is expected to open in Munich by the end of the year under the agreement and an option to develop the German market would require the German franchisee to open 100 stores over a five year period, the company said.
It said the franchisee's partners, Knut Steglich and Ingo Theuerkauf are senior executives with experience in the food industries.
New World Coffee currently owns, operates and franchises cafes in New York, New Jersey, Pannsylvania and Connecticut.
